# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an interaction for Live Text actions with items in an image.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor override dynamic init()
```

## Creating an image interaction

- **init(_:)**: Creates an interaction for Live Text actions with the specified delegate.

items.description: Creates an interaction for Live Text actions with the specified delegate.
